parameters.name: thg_mag_rvk
parameters.description: Magnetic field variation B in HEZ vector components

parameters.name: thg_magh_rvk
parameters.description: ---> H - Local magnetic North component of B

parameters.name: thg_magd_rvk
parameters.description: ---> E - Local magnetic East component of B

parameters.name: thg_magz_rvk
parameters.description: ---> Z - Local vertical down component of B
